title: American Horror Story 9: 1984  (OFFICIAL TEASER TRAILER)
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: we need the 80's Lana Winters guys.
I’m crying I need more clips! ❤️
I just really want to see the 80's rendition of the AHS opening credits theme...

1984 is also a book written by George Orwell about a dystopian society. Maybe elements of this including the whole 80s slasher flick vibes; possibly even tying in some aliens and supernatural ghost/campfire stories and stuff.

A lot happened during this time in ahs universe. Fiona was supreme. 
The countess helped Liz Taylor evolve. Lana Winters was making a name for herself.  That was two years after Constance murdered Moira and her husband. Also those nurses who murdered those elderly people to spell out murder in Roanoke. Pretty sure we’re going to have lots of ties to 80s slasher films  , pop culture and more connections to murderhouse. Can’t wait for the trailer premiere at Comic-Con
